definition: to bring under permanent control/to effect a radical cure
root/basis/classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings/CL:條|条[tiao2]/radical (chemistry)
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: There was no relapse after radical operation.
sentences.chinese: 行根治性手術切除後，未見覆發。

sentences.english: The first importand task in blindness prevention still is the dlimination of cataract blindness.
sentences.chinese: 防盲工作的首要任務仍是根治白內障盲。

sentences.english: Since 1990,46 patients have underwent surgical management of Tetralogy of Fallot.
sentences.chinese: 自1990年以來，共行法樂氏四聯症根治術46例。

sentences.english: The cure for triangulation is trust and intimacy.
sentences.chinese: 互相信任與親密無間是根治第三方捲入的良方。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical outcomes of total resection of lesser curvature used for radical treatment of distal gastric carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胃小彎全切術在遠端胃癌根治術中的應用。

sentences.english: To bring the pollution under permant coutrol, sustainable development strategy must be carried out.
sentences.chinese: 要實現淮河水污染的根治，必須實施可持續發展戰略。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the long term curative effect of adjuvant FAM chemotherapy after radical operation of gastric carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胃癌根治術後應用輔助化療患者的遠期療效。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the methods and experience of radical therapy of central arteriovenous malformation of the jaw.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討下頜骨動靜脈畸形的根治性治療方法和經驗。

sentences.english: Neoadjuvant radio (chemo-) therapy is the best option in order to realize a radical resection.
sentences.chinese: 新輔助放化療是實行根治切除的最好選擇。

sentences.english: How to effect a radical cure paronychia ?
The discovery of a vaccine was the turning point in the fight against smallpox.
sentences.chinese: 牛痘苗的發現是根治天花的關鍵。

sentences.english: Methods Primary radical surgical procedure was applied in the treatment of 91 cases with perianal abscess.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用一次性根治術治療肛周膿腫91例。

sentences.english: To study the effect of single lung ventilation for esophagectomy in the treatment of esophageal cancer patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究單肺通氣用於食管癌根治術時對病人的影響。

sentences.english: The key to rooting out corruption lies in the perfection of legal system and the strengthening of cultural construction.
sentences.chinese: 根治腐敗的關鍵在於健全法制，加強制度和文化建設。

sentences.english: How to effect a radical cure fibroma?
There is no radical cure for cancer.
sentences.chinese: 現在還沒有根治癌症的辦法。

definition: to treat the symptoms but not the root cause
stubborn illness/disease that is difficult to treat
to treat only the symptoms but not the root cause
to take radical measures/to get to the root (of a problem etc)
to recur (of a disease)/to reappear/to relapse (into a former bad state)
effective medicine for a specific condition/highly effective medicine
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
correct diagnosis/to prescribe the right cure for an illness/to suit the medicine to the illness
